selected_quotes: carbs make your LDL profile worse, increase small dense particles. Eat low carb
One of the most concise, best written abstracts I've read. Wish they were all this good.
Conversely, diets that aim at a reduction of carbohydrate intake are able to improve LDL quality.
#lowcarb effect #LDL quality, gotta open eyes to see. Lipidology is more than just LDL conc
Many studies show that #LCHF is healthy so logic say we should.... sue Costco for labeling coconut oil as healthy.

citation.abstract: This article aims at reviewing the recent findings that have been made concerning the crosstalk of carbohydrate metabolism with the generation of small, dense low-density lipoprotein (LDL) particles, which are known to be associated with an adverse cardiovascular risk profile.
citation.journal: Current Opinion in Clinical Nutrition and Metabolic Care
citation.title: Regulation of low-density lipoprotein subfractions by carbohydrates.
